rule: If "CantAnswer" is chosen as the output, it must signify the chatbot was completely unable to process or make a determination for any unspecified reason.
complianceText:
The chatbot output consists of a single tag 'JJ', which is present in the list of allowed part-of-speech tags specified in the <DESC>. The output consists of one line and does not contain any extra text. The description does not specify what the input is, so only checking if it follows the constraints which do not require knowing the input.
OK
